data.message: You are one of the greatest of all time...your next step is not to show the world that you are one of the greatest...because  you are already there...but to show them why...let me work for you...do not show them anything new...make a video for "As the World Turns"....remind them why...I can direct this video for you...this is one of your greatest songs....do this and it will remind your fans why you are a legend. Let me direct it..I already know your next one after that....please continue writing "No Favors" is a classic, but do not put out anything new....let me work for you...#Javy
